name: Monsoon Dreams
description: A blend of tradition and modernity, inspired by the monsoon.
descriptionLarger: A blend of tradition and modernity, inspired by the monsoon. This piece captures the essence of rain-soaked landscapes and vibrant colors, perfect for the contemporary wardrobe.

name: Polo Shirt
description: Contemporary takes on traditional weaving techniques.
descriptionLarger: Contemporary takes on traditional weaving techniques. This polo shirt combines classic style with modern aesthetics, making it a versatile addition to any wardrobe.

name: T-Shirt
descriptionLarger: Traditional weaving with contemporary designs. This t-shirt is a perfect blend of comfort and style, showcasing the rich heritage of textile craftsmanship.

name: Delta Blues
description: Indigo dye  inspired by river life.
descriptionLarger: Indigo dye inspired by river life. This piece reflects the serene beauty of water bodies, bringing a touch of nature's tranquility to your wardrobe.

name: Jamdani Scarves
descriptionLarger: Traditional weaving with contemporary designs. These scarves are not just accessories but a statement of elegance and cultural heritage, perfect for any occasion.

name: Urban Jamdani 1.0
descriptionLarger: Next generation of traditional fusion. This piece combines modern aesthetics with the rich heritage of Jamdani weaving, making it a unique addition to your collection.
